name: Capi Calma
description:
Ajude Capi a atravessar a floresta neste puzzle para você ficar calmo!

Help Capi to cross the forest in this puzzle to calm yourself!

Controles/Controls:

Use o mouse para interagir com os botões e ferramentas.

Use the mouse to interact with the buttons and tools.

Créditos/Credits:

  • Programming, 2D & 3D Art, Game Design: Bernardo Alvarez Braga
  • Skybox: Borodar (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-cl...)
  • Particles: Jean Moreno (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-remaster-free-109...)
